channel.title: Need Help Fixing A 317 Sever
channel.description:
I'm Coding A 317 Server I have got it online for a friend and done ranking and all the basics for the server. This is really want i need help for ::Staffzone ::Skillarea And quest tab help. Basically if you click on barrage runes it give you vengence runes. Which is obviously messed up. This Is what i need someone to help me achieve. Gold Ring < Not to be used In Pking. Quest Tab < You Click It You get It. Donator Cape < Donators Only. Skill Area < For your non Comabat Skills. Staff Zone < For Mods, Donators, Admins. The Source Im using is The :::Demise Pking Source. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,411633.0.html It Shouldnt take long if I get someone to help me. If you can help me code I would be really greatful.
Please Don't hate on Me for not being able to do this on My own. Reply to this if you can help me. Or Add my Msn Which is : Joshuawhitehead_28@hotmail.co.uk In game username On Apotheosis Pk : Just RainGod Thanks So much Whoever can help me.

item.title: Need Help Fixing A 317 Sever
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I guarantee if you try and fix this yourself with as little outside help as possible you will learn something from it. Having somebody do all the work for you won’t do anything. Also I removed the link to your website as advertising is not allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Fixing A 317 Sever
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

You seem smart, if you look in these classes, you should be able to figure it out, but if you still can’t send me a Pm.

Client, Clickingmost, TextHandler.

Also don’t post links to websites here, you aren’t allowed.
